user_query: I need news updates for the entertainment industry in Australia and Canada. Can you provide me with the most recent news articles? It would be great if you could include images and a short summary for each article.

TaskList.description: Fetch the most recent news articles for the entertainment industry in Australia.
Fetch the most recent news articles for the entertainment industry in Canada.
Combine and format the news articles from both Australia and Canada to include images and short summaries for each article.
